title: Dashboard Tour
description: Learn how to navigate the stock dashboard

steps.title: Welcome to the Dashboard
steps.content: This is the main dashboard where you can browse and discover stocks. Let's walk through the key features.

steps.title: Search for Stocks
steps.content: Use the search bar to find specific stocks by ticker symbol or company name. Try searching for 'AAPL' or 'Apple'.

steps.title: Filter by Sector
steps.content: Filter stocks by sector to focus on specific industries like Technology, Healthcare, or Financial Services.

steps.title: Stock Cards
steps.content: Each card shows a stock with its ticker, name, sector, and market cap. Click any card to see detailed analysis.

steps.title: Score Badge
steps.content: The score badge shows our composite rating (0-100). Higher scores indicate stronger overall investment metrics.

steps.title: Add to Watchlist
steps.content: Click the bookmark icon to add stocks to your watchlist. You can track your favorite stocks from the Watchlist page.

steps.title: Browse More Stocks
steps.content: Use pagination to browse through all available stocks. You're ready to explore!
